channel.title: Black Cumin on Enjoyable Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Black Cumin on Enjoyable Recipes

item.title: Nirameesh Aloo Poshto
item.description: Itâ€™s starting to rain at Bangalore these days. I love the rains. I miss the fact that it rains here usually in the afternoon. When I was growing up at Ranchi, there were no such timing. In fact there were quite a few days when it rained 5-6 days continuously. I have special memories of the lunch mom used to serve during these days. After coming back from school, I had to have bath (else no lunch).
